ISSUE.TITLE: [bug]: recent page hiding last item on scroll
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Is there an existing issue for this? - [X] I have searched the existing issues ### Current behavior When you have large numbers of `Pages` created and you are looking through the `Recent` tab. It not scrolling the last item or not showing the last item on the list ![RECENT PAGE OVERFLOW HIDDEN](https://github.com/makeplane/plane/assets/97095857/7c276a24-6eda-41ef-9891-a2023d16fd3f) ### Steps to reproduce Create as many `Pages` you like to that can be scroll ### Browser Google Chrome ### Version Local
